function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation leading to poor indoor air quality and increased risk of airborne disease transmission","Impact":"Increased spread of airborne diseases, potential for respiratory disorders, and discomfort for building occupants","Mitigation":"Implementation of effective ventilation systems to dilute and remove airborne contaminants, regular maintenance of ventilation systems, and awareness of the importance of ventilation in disease control","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, mechanical ventilation systems, natural ventilation systems, and hybrid ventilation systems","People":"Building occupants, healthcare workers, visitors, and individuals in close proximity to infected individuals","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, HVAC technicians"},{"Description":"Inadequate air disinfection strategies leading to increased risk of airborne disease transmission","Impact":"Increased spread of airborne diseases and potential for cross-infection within indoor environments","Mitigation":"Implementation of effective air disinfection strategies, regular cleaning and maintenance of air disinfection systems, and awareness of the importance of air disinfection in disease control","Technologies":"UV-C air disinfection systems, HEPA filtration systems, electrostatic air purifiers, and antimicrobial coatings","People":"Building occupants, healthcare workers, visitors, and individuals in close proximity to infected individuals","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, infection control specialists"},{"Description":"Lack of awareness and education regarding the importance of ventilation and airflow control in disease transmission","Impact":"Risk of inadequate ventilation and control of airflow leading to increased spread of infectious diseases","Mitigation":"Education and training on the importance of ventilation, dissemination of guidelines for ventilation and airflow control, and collaboration with ventilation experts to optimize indoor environments","Technologies":"Dissemination of educational materials, online training programs, and collaboration with ventilation experts","People":"Building occupants, healthcare workers, facility managers, and ventilation experts","Owner":"Health organizations, building owners, facility managers"}]}
